data.title: Gerard & Anton Awards 2024
data.meta_description: The 10th annual Gerard & Anton Awards ceremony is set for Thurs., July 3rd at the Summer Tent, High Tech Campus.
data.text:
It‚Äôs the 10th edition of the Gerard & Anton Awards, and we‚Äôre ready to celebrate in a big way ‚Ä¶ under the Big Top! üé™

The Gerard & Anton Awards is the annual celebration of the ten most promising startups in Brainport, and at the awards event, the ten winning startups are announced and applauded.

Event details

üìÜ Thurs., July 3rd

‚è∞ 17:00: Registration and walk-in

17:30: Welcome remarks and kick off of the Gerard & Anton Awards 2024: 10th Anniversary Edition

18:30: BBQ and networking

üìçSummer Tent | Event Square | High Tech Campus Eindhoven

There were more than 70 startups nominated for the annual awards, proving once again there is no shortage of startups coming out of Brainport.

Following the awards announcements, we‚Äôll enjoy a nice BBQ and network at the special Summer Tent, only on Campus through July to celebrate the 25th anniversary of High Tech Campus: Rewind & Fast Forward.

The rockstar jury ‚Äì comprised of startup stakeholders, movers and shakers and led by Alderman Stijn Steenbakkers ‚Äì once again had to make tough decisions in choosing this year‚Äôs winners.

Join us and raise your glass to vibrant, exciting, ‚Äúfast-forward‚Äù startups and meet the founders and teams building companies of the future.
